forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun graces Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, a gentle warmth envelops the city, beckoning residents and visitors alike to step outside. The sky is a brilliant blue, punctuated only by wispy clouds, their presence so minimal it seems they are mere afterthoughts of an artist's brush. With temperatures beginning to dip from a pleasant high, a soft breeze from the west southwest dances through the streets, invigorating the air while playfully tousling hair and leaves alike.

As evening approaches, the fog, a familiar companion to this coastal gem, will embrace the city once more. Tonight promises to bring areas of fog after midnight, draping a delicate veil over the skyline, while partly cloudy skies will cradle the city below. Temperatures will settle into a comfortable coolness, inviting a light jacket or layered sweater as the day shifts into night. 

Whether meandering through the vibrant neighborhoods or enjoying a leisurely stroll by the waterfront, this weather offers an ideal backdrop for simple, serene pleasures. Take a moment to savor a warm drink at one of your favorite cafés or explore the hidden alleys adorned with art and life. The city, in its current splendor, invites you to relish the exquisite balance of the day—a celebration of warmth now intertwined with the promise of evening chill.
